data.name: Blocked!
data.detailed_description:
Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing.

Gameplay


Every player controls a square block that can move, jump and interact with the playing area and other players. Your task is to beat your friends in a series of minigames, ranging from well-known classics such as snake and road crossing, to more unique ones like bomb tag. No skill will be left unchallenged - speed, quick thinking, patience, strategy and reflexes will all come into play.

Features


Focus on playability: The game can be played with a controller or keyboard - in fact, up to 4 players can play on the same keyboard, if you can manage to sit together tight enough. In the spirit of the easy to play nature of the game, extra players can join in on the fun at any time! Even if you're right in the middle of a match, another member can simply pick up a controller and join without as much as pausing the ongoing game.

Fun for anyone at anytime: All the minigames are designed to be playble by anyone, regardless of their prior gaming experience. You also don't need any preparation time, going from starting the game to starting a match in mere seconds.

Lots of content: 15 playable minigames (so far) taking course in over 30 different hand-crafted environments.

Playable on any PC: The artstyle is based on low-poly meshes, meaning the game can run even on old or low-power hardware.

Play over the internet with Steam Remote Play Together Not in the same house? No problem! You can use Steam Remote Play Together and play over the internet without buying a second copy.

Include your personal touch: The game includes dozens of hidden cosmetic items to spruce up your block, all of which are unlockable simply by playing the game.

data.short_description: Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing. Outsmart your friends in various classic and unique minigames.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game was tested running at 1080p and 30fps with this hardware. Less powerful setups may experience poor performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
